name: Socket Up
description:
Disclaimer

All artwork is made on location by folded paper, strings and sharpie. Game takes less than 10 minutes to complete, and is a barebones prototype made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam.

Story

Discover the papercraft world of Socket Up as a small, dysfunctional robot, who needs to repair his friends and himself. 

How many of your own parts are you willing to give up to spare your friends?

Made by

Nils "Gecko" Munch

Jonas Lohardt Havlykke

Daniel "Zenreth" Thomsen

Jill L Petersen
